entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
